message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $11,500. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know your thoughts!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'd be willing to make a serious commitment to buy it from you if we can meet at that price.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your offer.  While I value your business, $9,500 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10,500.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm hoping we can reach an agreement at this price.
